description:
In this Volume 1 course, you'll find a succinct course designed to get you confident with using 'Scrivener' - by 'Tick Training' - see their website for more.

You will be introduced to some key elements of Scrivener and receive ideas and suggestions how it can be used with your writing career. If new to the program, you will find some great information here.

This course should allow any writer to use Scrivener.

At the end of the course, you should be able to create a Scrivener project.

Even though aimed at teachers, if you are a writer of any kind - a novelist, a poet, a screenwriter, a blogger - and require some easy direction with using Scrivener, then this is the course for you. Scrivener is revolutionary writing software that can take your projects to the next level.
title: Scrivener - An easy guide
